title: Volume of a solid with known cross-section

content.prompt: Let R be the region in the first quadrant bounded below by the graph of y= x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A1D@ and above by the graph of y= x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@394F@ . R is the base of a solid whose cross sections perpendicular to the x-axis are squares. What is the volume of the solid?

topic.text: 8.7: Volumes with Cross Sections - Squares and Rectangles

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
